description: Convert text to speech with AI enhancement for better product assistance responses

body.text: Hola, estoy buscando unos auriculares para trabajar desde casa

expected_response.description: MP3 audio file with enhanced synthesized speech

curl_example: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/query-text-to-voice -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"Hola, busco zapatos","voice":"nova"}' --output speech.mp3
notes: Available voices: alloy, echo, fable, onyx, nova, shimmer. Text gets enhanced by GPT-4o-mini for better conversational responses (max 30 tokens). Default voice is nova.
